pull.title: [Qt] fix transaction details output-index to reflect vout index
pull.body:
Bugfix.

This should fix https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/9631.
After this PR, the Transaction Details "Output Index" would correspond with the vout-index (RPC `vout` field).
